MessengerConsent.description: You are leaving terra.art to open an external application. Please note that by proceeding, your phone number and profile data will be visible to the messenger platform.
MessengerConsent.checkbox_label: By clicking the WhatsApp/Telegram button, you agree that your phone number and messages will be directed to the corresponding messenger to contact you. More details in the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

Hero.title: Cultivating <living>living art</living> on your land
Hero.subtitle: Bespoke architectural landscapes where nature meets precision.
Hero.experience_desc: Acres of curated ecosystems across the globe.
Hero.approach_desc: We take on the full cycle of work: from soil analysis to subsequent garden care, guaranteeing a result that will exceed expectations.
Hero.approach_step1_desc: Study of terrain, insolation, and soil composition to create a sustainable ecosystem.
Hero.approach_step2_desc: Unique sketches and 3D visualization reflecting your character and lifestyle.
Hero.approach_step3_desc: Strict architectural supervision and work of experienced engineers at every stage.
Hero.approach_step4_desc: Professional care by gardeners so your garden flourishes every year.
Hero.service1_desc: Geoplastics and terrace creation for unique site geometry.
Hero.service2_desc: Smart Hunter and Rain Bird irrigation systems for lawn health.
Hero.service3_desc: Evening lighting scenarios for atmosphere and safety.
Hero.service4_desc: Instant effect of an adult garden with a survival guarantee.
Hero.service5_desc: Ponds, streams, fountains, and biopools for relaxation.
Hero.service6_desc: Gazebos, pergolas, benches, and art objects of individual design.
Hero.cta_desc: Leave a request for a free visit from a landscape architect. We will evaluate the potential of your territory and suggest ideas.

Footer.description: Pioneering the future of landscape architecture through ecological intelligence and minimalist design.
Footer.messaging_disclaimer: By clicking the WhatsApp/Telegram/VK button, you agree that your phone number and messages will be directed to the corresponding messenger to contact you. More details in the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

Services.title: Cultivating <sanctuary>Sanctuary</sanctuary>
Services.description: Where precision engineering meets organic artistry. We sculpt environments that breathe, enduring beyond the seasons.
Services.hardscaping_desc: Sculpting earth to create dimension. We manipulate topography to reveal hidden potentials.
Services.hydro_desc: Invisible infrastructure. Precision engineering that manages water flow seamlessly.
Services.lumination_desc: Atmospheric curation. We paint with light to extend beauty into the evening.
Services.greening_desc: Botanic curation focused on resilience. A living palette of texture and color.
Services.process_01_desc: Understanding the soul of the site and the desires of the dweller. We begin with deep listening.
Services.process_02_desc: Selecting materials that age gracefully. Every stone, light fixture, and sapling is chosen for permanence.
Services.process_03_desc: A meticulous installation process where precision meets the unpredictable nature of the wild.

Projects.description: We create bespoke landscapes that breathe. Explore our collection of award-winning sustainable gardens and outdoor living spaces.

kyoto.title: Kyoto Zen Residence
kyoto.desc: Engineering the ancient Japanese philosophy into a modern architectural garden.
kyoto.full_desc: The Kyoto Zen Residence project is a synthesis of traditional Japanese aesthetics and advanced ecological technologies. We created a space that fosters deep meditation while serving as a resilient ecosystem.
kyoto.challenge: The requirement was to integrate a meditation garden into a constrained urban space with variable lighting and complex drainage.
kyoto.solution: We applied vertical structuring and a concealed rainwater harvesting system. Using native moss species and strategically placed stones created the feeling of a boundless forest.

terracotta.title: Terracotta Gardens
terracotta.desc: Restoring arid soil for a lush Mediterranean oasis.
terracotta.full_desc: The 'Terracotta Gardens' project demonstrates the possibilities of regenerative landscape architecture. We transformed a depleted site into a flourishing Mediterranean garden using innovative moisture conservation techniques.
terracotta.challenge: The soil was extremely depleted and prone to erosion, requiring a comprehensive approach to biome restoration.
terracotta.solution: The implementation of terracotta capillary irrigation systems and deep organic mulching allowed for the creation of a sustainable moist environment without excessive water consumption.

emerald.title: Emerald Forest
emerald.desc: Integrating modern living into a dense woodland slope.
emerald.full_desc: The 'Emerald Forest' project focuses on the symbiosis of architecture and wildlife. We created a living space that is seamlessly integrated into the existing forest ecosystem, preserving its pristine look.
emerald.challenge: The complex terrain of the forest slope and the critical need to preserve the root systems of ancient trees.
emerald.solution: The use of a 'floating' terrace system on screw piles and permeable coatings made it possible to minimize interference with the soil cover.

skyline.title: Skyline Roof Deck
skyline.desc: Creating privacy and wind protection at 40 stories.
skyline.full_desc: The 'Skyline Roof Deck' project is an oasis of tranquility amidst a noisy metropolis. We created a functional space for relaxation, protected from the harsh conditions of high-rise buildings.
skyline.challenge: Extreme wind loads at high altitudes and strict weight restrictions for roofing structures.
skyline.solution: The use of lightweight polymer substrates and the installation of cascading windbreaks made of tempered glass, complemented by wind-resistant grasses.

zen.title: The Zen Courtyard
zen.desc: Maximizing natural light in a minimalist urban atrium.
zen.full_desc: The 'The Zen Courtyard' project reinterprets the courtyard space as the meditative center of the home. Minimalism and the play of light create an atmosphere of endless space even in a small area.
zen.challenge: A closed space with minimal access to sunlight and complex acoustics.
zen.solution: The use of reflective materials, shade-tolerant flora and cascading water features that absorb urban noise.

heritage.title: Heritage Manor
heritage.desc: Preserving historical ancient trees while modernizing pathways.
heritage.full_desc: In the 'Heritage Manor' project, we worked with a historical estate where every element has its own story. We updated functional areas, preserving the spirit and grandeur of the ancient park.
heritage.challenge: The need to lay modern communications and paths in the immediate vicinity of protected century-old oaks.
heritage.solution: Ground-penetrating radar scanning of roots and the use of manual labor when installing pathways made of natural aged stone.

Philosophy.description: Where nature's ancient wisdom meets architectural precision. We don't just design landscapes; we curate living ecosystems that breathe.
Philosophy.section2_desc: Our methodology goes beyond aesthetics. We employ scientific analysis to ensure every plant, stone, and water feature contributes to a self-sustaining biome.
Philosophy.eco_desc: We design closed-loop ecosystems where waste becomes nutrient. Our water retention landscapes capture 95% of rainfall, reducing irrigation needs and creating resilient micro-climates.
Philosophy.climatic_desc: Every species is chosen based on 50-year climate projections. We prioritize hyper-local natives that thrive in your specific soil chemistry and sun exposure without artificial life support.

timeline_items.title: Foundation
timeline_items.desc: Terraform established with a single mission: to challenge traditional, wasteful landscaping practices.

timeline_items.title: The Water Shift
timeline_items.desc: Introduced our proprietary hydro-zoning technique, reducing client water usage by an average of 60%.

timeline_items.title: Carbon Neutral
timeline_items.desc: Achieved full carbon neutrality across all operations and supply chains. First in the region.

Philosophy.cultivators_desc: Minds dedicated to the art of living architecture.
Philosophy.team_bio: Dedicated to the art of living architecture and sustainable design legacies.
Philosophy.cta_desc: Let's discuss how we can transform your space into a sustainable legacy.

Contacts.title: Let's Cultivate Your <living_space>Living Space</living_space>
Contacts.description: Connect with our principal architects to discuss your vision for a sustainable, luxury outdoor living space. We bridge nature and modern architecture.
